title: All Ball - Pt. 1 : Former Knicks and Grizzlies HC David Fizdale on L.A. Hoops Upbringing, Heat Video Room with Spo, Pat Riley
itunes:title: All Ball - Pt. 1 : Former Knicks and Grizzlies HC David Fizdale on L.A. Hoops Upbringing, Heat Video Room with Spo, Pat Riley
description:
In this episode, Doug reflects on Baylor taking it to Gonzaga in the national championship game, and is joined by former Knicks and Grizzlies Head Coach David Fizdale joins the pod - in the first of a two part interview - to discuss his L.A. hoops upbringing, playing college ball at San Diego, and how he got his big break as a video assistant with the Heat, and the time he sent Pat Riley home with a blank VHS scouting tape. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
